description: To create a PKPROJ file, select File â†’ New Project... , name the project, choose the .ROM file to modify, and click OK . When you create PKPROJ file, a CCS script file is automatically created with the same name as the project.
NOTE: Visual CCScript will run on Mac OS X and Linux with version 2.0 or later of the Mono Framework. You must recompile the CCScript compiler for the platform you use.
